responsibilities: Work on performant, reliable systems that allow users to capture large amounts of data from their smart machines, sync it to the cloud service, and query it.
Design and implement data processing and querying systems, and developer-friendly APIs.
Collaborate across other teams and mentor other engineers.
Improve the experience of the data developer.
Analyze performance and scale challenges and solve them.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on designing and implementing data processing and querying systems, improving the experience of data developers, and solving performance and scale challenges. There is no mention of working with language models or fine-tuning them for domain-specific tasks. The responsibilities are more aligned with data systems and infrastructure rather than language model customization.
